synopsis.text: Year ning for purpose in a bustling world above, a discarded black garbage bag resides in the unseen depths below the city streets. With no job, no shelter, and no kin, this forsaken sack embarks on a transformative journey, discovering new meaning through a series of unique encounters. This is the tale of an unlikely hero, who against all odds, finds the strength to rise from the underground and embrace a new lease on life. A heartwarming 2010 animation by Aki Kono, from Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
